price: 3. glorifica a tu Señor con alabanzas y pídele Su perdón, (pues) Él acepta siempre el arrepentimiento.
arabic: فَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرۡهُۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ تَوَّابَۢا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: fasabbiḥ biḥamdi rabbika wa-is'taghfir'hu innahu kāna tawwāban
